application

Class ServiceLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.ServiceLocator

  • public class ServiceLocator
extends java.lang.Object
    Copyright 2015, FHNW, Prof. Dr. Brad Richards. All rights reserved. This code is licensed under the terms of the BSD 3-clause license (see the file license.txt). The singleton instance of this class provide central storage for resources used by the program. It also defines application-global constants, such as the application name.
    Author:
    Brad Richards
